janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage darshanayath janathawage apekshawath ekak misa dekak nowana bawa agamathi acharya di.mu jayarathna mahatha pawasiya.wathman nayakathwaye pahadili dakmen shri lankawa aasiyawe shighrayen sanwardhanaya kara yomu wu ratak bawata pathwa athi bawada hethema kiweya.kolambaa galadari hotalaye eeye (14) pawathi aasiyanu adhyapanaya pilibanda deweni jathyanthara samuluwa amathamin agamathiwaraya ese prakasha keleya.ratawal wisipahaka wishwawidyala thishathaka niyojithayo wishala pirisak me samuluwata sahabhagi wi siti athara mehidi wishwawidyalawala deshapalana widwathunge sahaya deshapalanayata sambandha karaganne keseda?

hama kathawakinma mage yati hithe thibune me ramanige hitha gannayi.
eeta amatharawa me rate widwathun kihipadenekuth adhyaksha mandalaye wada karanawa.

me sambandha wadidura marana parikshanaya kalubowila dakunu kolambaa shikshana rohale wadabalana hadisi marana parikshaka sama winisuru parinda kotugoda mahatha hamuwe pawathi athara, ehidi wadiduratath sakshi dun sakshikaru meseda kiya.

suthra prethayage kathawa :-
thama methuwakma aya ha sanwadayadi aththe, aya nannadunana keneku lesa salakaganeya.
mama ha mage siyaluma kamitu samajikayan pasugiya masa thuna hamaraka kalaya thula sampurna winiwidabhawayakin yuthuwa sama ginum katayuththakma karala thiyanawa.
numbaata kelehi gunayak na.
sinhala bauddha sanskruthiya lankawe pradhana sanskruthiya hatiyata piligannawada?/

eeke prathipalayak widiyata ape ranawiruwanta wiruddhawa, ratata wiruddhawa asathya wartha liyanna awashya kumanthrana diyath kala.mithrawaruni, apa eda prakasha kala oba satan kale athaka gini awiyath, athaka manawa himikam pragnyapthiyath, uraye asaranayinta dena kama pakattuwath, hadawathe daru senehasath daragena bawa.
gajeta andumak andina eka majik nemeyi.
maligawen pitathata with siya walawwa kara ahalepola thama asu meheya wuye kalpana sagarayaka gilemini.ohuta ekama sanasima nam thama aadaraniya biriya saha du daruwanya.
dewani de sambandhayen labiya yuthu agaya nolabena bawa ya.
bas ekakata salli dila tikat ekak aran denna” kiyala.

dewanna wiwidha rogabadha suwa kirima sambandhayen widyawa athikramanaya kala wiwidha guptha prathikara krama athayi yana mithya wishwasaya wasangatha men ratapura pathirayamaya.
